item.description:
Join us for a fabulous holiday party and charity event- the annual SnowBall! This is a wonderful event (always very popular) and supports some great Boston area charities.


Santa Claus Anonymous proudly presents the 24th Annual SnowBall to benefit Boston inner-city youth enrichment programs on Friday, December 10, 2010 at Seaport Hotel Boston, One Seaport Lane, Boston from 9:00 PM to 2:00 AM. Boston's best band Kahootz will be performing and help keep the dance floor moving. Attendees may also visit our Casino, bid on items at a Silent Auction, and take a photos with Santa Claus at our Santa Booth. A Cash Bar and Light Hors D'oeuvres will also be provided. The attire is Black Tie Optional and the SnowBall is a 21+ event. Please make sure that you and your guest(s) bring a valid photo identification with you to the SnowBall.

Get your tickets early! $55 Discounted tickets are currently available until November 8, the price will go up to $65 from Nov 9- Dec. 8 and $75 after that.

Get your tickets at: http://www.scaboston....
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside event ballroom. Please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: 23rd Annual SnowBall, one of Boston's largest holiday charity events
